faq-one-title: How do I place an order?
faq-one-content: To place an order, select the product you wish to purchase and click 'Add to Cart'. Then go to the cart and follow the steps to complete the purchase.
faq-two-title: Can I change or cancel my order?
faq-two-content: You can change or cancel your order within 24 hours of placing it. Contact our customer service for assistance.
faq-three-content: We accept credit cards and Klarna.
faq-four-title: What should I do if I receive the wrong item or a defective product?
faq-four-content: If you have received the wrong or a defective product, contact our customer service immediately for assistance with a return or exchange.
